quotes.quote: Puff up your chest. Take a deep breath. You're gonna be Okay...
quotes.author: Ashh Blackwood

quotes.quote: If it's loud in your mind? Just take your time. You're gonna be Okay...
quotes.author: Ashh Blackwood

quotes.quote: Friend, I pity your poor bleeding heart; and I love you the more because it does so bleed.
quotes.author: Bram Stoker

quotes.quote: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
quotes.author: Martin Fowler

quotes.quote: Programs must be written for people to read, and only incidentally for machines to execute.
quotes.author: Harold Abelson

quotes.quote: Truth can only be found in one place: the code.
quotes.author: Robert C. Martin

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.quote: The most disastrous thing that you can ever learn is your first programming language.
quotes.author: Alan Kay

quotes.quote: The most important property of a program is whether it accomplishes the intention of its user.
quotes.author: C.A.R. Hoare

quotes.quote: The best code is no code at all.
quotes.author: Jeff Atwood

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The function of good software is to make the complex appear to be simple.
quotes.author: Grady Booch

quotes.quote: The best thing about a boolean is even if you are wrong, you are only off by a bit.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I would love to change the world, but they wonâ€™t give me the source code.
quotes.author: Anonymous
